cold_run.notes: All files parsed fresh (no cache); 1201 stores populate both memory and disk cache.

warm_run_disk_cache.notes: 100% disk cache hit rate. Disk cache is slower than cold run due to serial get_cached() I/O before parallelization.

analysis.cold_vs_warm: Warm (disk) is slower (4.3s) than cold (3.3s) because get_cached() checks disk serially before parallelizing.
analysis.optimization_opportunity: Skip disk cache check during bulk parallel parse; rely on memory-only or lazy disk population.
analysis.recommendation: For bulk analysis, prefer cold start; disk cache optimized for incremental single-file updates.
